problem.markdown:
x = 0 

while True:
    if x < 10:
        print('run forever')
        x += 1
    else:
        break

The output of from running the above code is most like ___

(x) "run forever" (10 times) ( ) "run forever" (9 times) ( ) "run forever" ( ) No output

multiplechoiceresponse.p: The output of from running the above code is most like ___
